Sri City is exactly 56 Kms from Chennai towards North on NH5 from Koyambedu Bus Station. the approximate return Cab/Taxi fare from Chennai to would be Indica (4 people) (Rs)1,400, Qualis (6 people) (Rs)2,000.
We have plenty of buses to Tada from Koyambedu, one such bus is Bus No.114 - 'Chennai to Kalahasthi' which has a stop over at Tada.

Some of them are Kobelco, VRV India, Venture Automotive Tooling India, BFG International, Amphenol Mobile Communication Products, Lovepac Converting, Eura D&A, Tablets India, Rockworth Systems Furniture, Saakar Printing Design, A.S.
